message:
{% set dotted_manager_name = frappe.db.get_value("Employee", doc.employee, "employee_name") %}

Hi {{ dotted_manager_name }},

The reporting manager has added their feedback for {{ doc.employee_name }} in the Probation Feedback Form.
Kindly review the form and add your rating at your earliest convenience.

Thank you!
HR Team
name: Inform Dotted Manager about Probation Feedback
subject: Please Add Your Rating to Probation Feedback Form
